articles.description: Watch and follow live text commentary of Chris Eubank Jr vs Conor Benn weigh-in before their fight on Saturday.

articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr will be fined £375,500 after weighing 0.5lb too heavy for Saturday's grudge match with Conor Benn.

articles.description: As Nottingham Forest, Aston Villa and Man City play in the FA Cup semi-finals this weekend, what's more important - a trophy or a place in the Champions League?
